name: Sea Shells' House
description:
A simple pong game to empty the mind...

Press Enter to release the pong; left/right to move the platforms; Press R to restart.

Credits for Sound and Images used:

- Sound effect from soundsnap.com

-Images from MIX RELAX@Youtube, Shell Horizons.com, shell-of-aquarius.com, Glen Carrie@Unsplash, Toa Heftiba@Unsplash
